mapper.select: SELECT user_id, age, address, phone_number, gender, portfolio_url, self_intro, job_type, experience_years, primary_resume_id FROM applicant_profiles WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO applicant_profiles (user_id, age, address, phone_number, gender, portfolio_url, self_intro, job_type, experience_years, primary_resume_id) VALUES (#{userId}, #{age}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{gender}, #{portfolioUrl}, #{selfIntro}, #{jobType}, #{experienceYears}, #{primaryResumeId})
